abstract: Heroku, a platform provider built on top of Amazon’s EC2 compute infrastructure, has raised $10 million in its second round of funding, bringing its total investment to $15 million, GigaOm reported.
snippet: Heroku, a platform provider built on top of Amazon’s EC2 compute infrastructure, has raised $10 million in its second round of funding, bringing its total investment to $15 million, GigaOm reported.

headline.main: Heroku Raises $10 Million for Its Ruby Platform

abstract: The Federal Trade Commission wants to use the additional time, in part, to better understand the competitive effects of Apple’s purchase of Quattro Wireless, an AdMob rival.
snippet: The Federal Trade Commission wants to use the additional time, in part, to better understand the competitive effects of Apple’s purchase of Quattro Wireless, an AdMob rival.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — Google may have gotten some help from its rival Apple in its attempt to acquire the mobile advertising start-up AdMob.

headline.main: Google-AdMob Deal Gets Extended Federal Review
headline.print_headline: Google-AdMob Deal Gets Extended Federal Review

abstract: The future of news, Google predicting the future and the future of Elevation Partners tops the reading list.
snippet: The future of news, Google predicting the future and the future of Elevation Partners tops the reading list.
lead_paragraph: The tech editors and reporters at the New York Times found these articles worth passing on to others:
